text: DT40 B cells express two PKD isoforms , <extra_id_0> PKD1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> PKD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , and as previously described we have recently generated DT40 B cell lines that lack expression of either <extra_id_0> PKD1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> or <extra_id_0> PKD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> or both enzymes [ 1 ] .

text: In generating the double knockout cell lines we targeted the <extra_id_0> PKD1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> loci in a <extra_id_0> PKD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - cell line that expressed a Flag - <extra_id_0> PKD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transgene under the control of a doxycycline - inducible promoter .

Hence , in the presence of doxycycline , Flag - <extra_id_0> PKD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression in <extra_id_0> PKD1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> 3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> double knockout cells is comparable to endogenous <extra_id_0> PKD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> present in wild-type DT40 cells and removal of doxycycline from the culture media for 5 days results in a completely null PKD phenotype ( Fig . 1A ) .

text: Previously , we have demonstrated that phosphorylation and nuclear exclusion of class II histone deacetylases ( HDACs ) during BCR engagement is defective in <extra_id_0> PKD1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> 3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - B cells and can restored upon re-expression of a single PKD isoform [ 1 ] .

The small heat shock protein <extra_id_0> HSP27 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> has recently been proposed as a <extra_id_0> PKD1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> substrate [ 24 ] and we accordingly assessed whether PKD - null DT40 cells have defective phosphorylation of <extra_id_0> HSP27 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> on serine 82 , the proposed <extra_id_0> PKD1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> substrate sequence .

text: Hence , <extra_id_0> PKD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> as well as <extra_id_0> PKD1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> can regulate <extra_id_0> HSP27 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> phosphorylation and in DT40 B cells they are functionally redundant as <extra_id_0> HSP27 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> kinases .
